<p>I am a final-year Ph.D. student in the [Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics at Monash University](https://www.monash.edu/business/ebs), under the supervision of [Dr. Hamza Hanbali](https://findanexpert.unimelb.edu.au/profile/1083099-hamza-hanbali), [Professor Brett Inder](https://lens.monash.edu/@brett-inder) and [Dr. Jessica Leung](https://research.monash.edu/en/persons/jessica-leung). My research focuses on longevity risk management and designing pension solutions.</p>

<p>In addition to my research, I am also working as a teaching associate in the Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics at Monash University, Australia.</p>
